name: Dragon Quest I.II
overview: This is a remake of two first Dragon Quest titles, the second version of both Dragon Quest and Dragon Quest II, preceding the Game Boy Color compilation of Dragon Warrior I & II. This remake includes updated graphics that retain the original look, sound of higher quality, and some changes in the gameplay and in the game world: certain locations are larger, some menu commands (such as "Stairs") are omitted, and there is a larger variety of items. Though the two titles have since been separated for mobile phone releases, the changes implemented in the original Super Famicom bundle package have become permanent additions and improvements seen in every version of the games since.
